```{r materials, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}

library(glue)
pdf_item <- function(f='whatever.pdf', folder = 'materiaux'){
  
  baseurl <- 'https://idees.eric.auguie.eu/extension/'
  
  glue('<a href="{baseurl}/{folder}/{f}">{folder}/{f}</a> <br/>')
}

start <- '
<div id="container">
<header>
  <h1>Materiaux</h1>
</header>
'

end <- ' 
</div>
'    

library(purrr)

lf <- list.files(path = 'assets/materiaux/', include.dirs = FALSE)
lf <- lf[!grepl('readme.txt', lf)]
all_items <- purrr::map_chr(lf, pdf_item)

cat(start)
cat(all_items, sep = '\n')
cat(end)
```


```{r declaration, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}

start <- '
<div id="container">
<header>
  <h1>Declaration originale</h1>
</header>
'

end <- ' 
</div>
'    

library(purrr)

lf <- list.files(path = 'assets/declaration originale/', include.dirs = FALSE)
lf <- lf[!grepl('readme.txt', lf)]
all_items <- purrr::map_chr(lf, pdf_item, folder='declaration originale')

cat(start)
cat(all_items, sep = '\n')
cat(end)
```

```{r photo_item, echo=FALSE}
library(glue)
photo_item <- function(f='IMG_20130812_213252.jpg'){
  
  # baseurl <- 'https://idees.eric.auguie.eu/extension/photos 2013/'
  baseurl <- 'http://vigne-extension.imgix.net/photos 2013/'
  
  glue('<li data-src="{baseurl}{f}" data-sub-html="" data-download-url="{baseurl}{f}" data-filename="{baseurl}{f}"><a href="{baseurl}{f}"><img src="{baseurl}{f}?w=120&h=120" alt="{f}" width="120" height="120"></a></li>')
}

```

```{r container, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
start <- '
<div id="container">
<header>
  <h1>Photos</h1>
</header>

<ul id="media" class="clearfix">
 '         

library(purrr)

all_items <- purrr::map_chr(lf, photo_item)

end <- ' 
</ul>
'    

cat(start)
cat(all_items, sep = '\n')
cat(end)

```
